title: Did JM announce that it would stop making fuel-powered vehicles by 2035?
subtitle: "As one of the world's largest car manufacturers, we hope to set an example for responsible leadership in a world facing climate change," said the Executive Director of the Global Mechanism, Mary Barra, in January 2021.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The GM announced plans to stop the manufacture of gasoline-powered vehicles by 2035.
